register.reg_long_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Group 0 Enable register
register.reg_condition: when EL1 is capable of using AArch32 and FEAT_GICv3 is implemented

purpose_text.para: Controls whether Group 0 interrupts are enabled or not.

field_description.para: Virtual accesses to this register update ICH_VMCR.VENG0.

access_permission_text.para: The lowest Exception level at which this register can be accessed is governed by the Exception level to which FIQ is routed. This routing depends on .FIQ, .NS and .FMO.
If an interrupt is pending within the CPU interface when Enable becomes 0, the interrupt must be released to allow the Distributor to forward the interrupt to a different PE.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
